Positive: This design provides a space efficient housing for the technology, additionally due to the bolt latch this design would be secure within the climbing hold
Minus: The rectangular shape of this design does not mimic the innar rounded shape of a climbing hold, forcing this design to either be to small or extrude from within the cavity of the climbing hold
Improvement: The rectangular housing is efficient for technology as the electronics used in my design are rectangular, such as the ESP32 chip and battery charger although this shape needs to be redesigned to have a snug fit within the climbing hold. To improve this design the edges need to be rounded
